comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: This appears to be a "dream" of the bridge that would eventually materialize (opening to traffic in 1931) as the George Washington Bridge. chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030214/1910-08-14/ed-... has the related article. [left column, headline "Bridge Across Hudson"] www.fortleeonline.com/gwb/ has a history of the bridge.
